DeepAffects | Mumbai, India | Machine Learning Engineers, Data Engineers | Full-time | Onsite

DeepAffects (https://www.deepaffects.com) is a next-generation Enterprise Speech Analytics Company. We solve problems in speech domain using advanced Deep learning and Machine Learning techniques. Few examples of the problems are -

* Speaker Diarization on mono-channel recordings in noisy environment.

* Low latency Speech Enhancement.

* Audio Redaction for PII data. Think GDPR compliance directly on audio.

Technologies Used: Tensorflow, Keras, Kubernetes, Docker, Pub Sub Queues, Cassandra, Python
